mapper.select: select * from t_customer where site_code=#{siteCode} and account_id=#{accountId} and to_char(open_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')=#{openTime}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_T_CUSTOMER_ID.nextVal as seq_id from dual
merge into t_customer t1 using (select #{id} seq_id,#{accountId} account_id,#{siteCode} site_code,#{provinceCode} province_code,#{cityCode} city_code,#{countyCode} county_code,#{name} name, #{certType} cert_type,#{certId} cert_id,#{authOrg} auth_org,#{nationality} nationality,#{status} status,to_date(#{openTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') open_time,null close_time from dual) t2 on (t1.site_code = t2.site_code and t1.account_id=t2.account_id and t1.open_time=t2.open_time) when not matched then insert values (t2.seq_id,t2.account_id,t2.site_code,t2.province_code,t2.city_code,t2.county_code,t2.name,t2.cert_type, t2.cert_id,t2.auth_org,t2.nationality,t2.status,t2.open_time,t2.close_time)
